QuestData.Title: Divination: Gorefiend's Truncheon
QuestData.Description: One by one they knelt before him, offering their lives as a show of allegiance. Gorefiend hoisted his sickle and cut clean their heads. Shortly after this slaughter, Gorefiend took his own life.$B$BBut this was no act of contrition! No, Gorefiend sought immortality! From the corpses of the fallen death knights rose the Ghostriders of Karabor.$B$BThey now ride the roads encircling the Hand of Guldan, awaiting the day that their master returns. It is they who hold the truncheon of Gorefiend. Retrieve it...
QuestData.LogDescription: The Ancient Shadowmoon Spirit at the Altar of Shadows in southeast Shadowmoon Valley wants you to recover Gorefiend's Truncheon.
QuestData.CompletionText: You must use the Spectrecles if you wish to see the spirits of Shadowmoon.
QuestData.RewardText: Only with all three united may I divine the secrets you so desperately seek!
